name: action_values
description: The total value of all conversions attributed to your ads.

name: actions
description: The total number of actions people took that are attributed to your ads. Actions may include engagement, clicks or conversions.

name: ad_click_actions
description: ad_click_actions

name: ad_impression_actions
description: ad_impression_actions

name: auction_bid
description: auction_bid

name: auction_competitiveness
description: auction_competitiveness

name: auction_max_competitor_bid
description: auction_max_competitor_bid

name: canvas_avg_view_percent
description: The average percentage of the Instant Experience that people saw. An Instant Experience is a screen that opens after someone interacts with your ad on a mobile device. It may include a series of interactive or multimedia components, including video, images product catalog and more.

name: canvas_avg_view_time
description: The average total time, in seconds, that people spent viewing an Instant Experience. An Instant Experience is a screen that opens after someone interacts with your ad on a mobile device. It may include a series of interactive or multimedia components, including video, images product catalog and more.

name: catalog_segment_value
description: The total value of all conversions from your catalog segment attributed to your ads.

name: catalog_segment_value_mobile_purchase_roas
description: The total return on ad spend (ROAS) from mobile app purchases for your catalog segment.

name: catalog_segment_value_omni_purchase_roas
description: The total return on ad spend (ROAS) from all purchases for your catalog segment.

name: catalog_segment_value_website_purchase_roas
description: The total return on ad spend (ROAS) from website purchases for your catalog segment.

name: clicks
description: The number of clicks on your ads.

name: conversion_lead_rate
description: conversion_lead_rate

name: conversion_rate_ranking
description: A ranking of your ad's expected conversion rate. Your ad is ranked against ads with your optimization goal that competed for the same audience. Possible values include BELOW_AVERAGE_10, BELOW_AVERAGE_20, BELOW_AVERAGE_35, AVERAGE, ABOVE_AVERAGE, or UNKNOWN if there's not enough information about the ad. This metric is an ad relevance diagnostic and does not apply to campaigns or ad sets, only ads.

name: conversion_values
description: The total value of all conversions across all channels (i.e. website, mobile app, offline, and on-facebook) attributed to your ads. Visit the Ads Action Stats reference for a list of conversion values.

name: conversions
description: The total number of conversions across all channels (i.e. website, mobile app, offline, and on-facebook) attributed to your ads. Visit the Ads Action Stats reference for a list of conversions.

name: converted_product_quantity
description: The number of products purchased which are recorded by your merchant partner's pixel or app SDK for a given product ID and driven by your ads. Has to be used together with converted product ID breakdown.

name: converted_product_value
description: The value of purchases recorded by your merchant partner's pixel or app SDK for a given product ID and driven by your ads. Has to be used together with converted product ID breakdown.

name: cost_per_15_sec_video_view
description: cost_per_15_sec_video_view

name: cost_per_2_sec_continuous_video_view
description: cost_per_2_sec_continuous_video_view

name: cost_per_action_type
description: The average cost of a relevant action.

name: cost_per_ad_click
description: cost_per_ad_click

name: cost_per_conversion
description: The average cost of a conversion across all channels (i.e. website, mobile app, offline, and on-facebook). Conversions include contact, customize_product, donate, find_location, schedule, start_trial, submit_application, subscribe, recurring_subscription_payment, cancel_subscription, ad_click, ad_impression.

name: cost_per_conversion_lead
description: cost_per_conversion_lead

name: cost_per_dda_countby_convs
description: cost_per_dda_countby_convs

name: cost_per_estimated_ad_recallers
description: The average cost for each estimated ad recall lift. This metric is only available for assets in the Brand awareness, Post engagement and Video views Objectives. This metric is estimated and in development.

name: cost_per_inline_link_click
description: The average cost of each inline link click.

name: cost_per_inline_post_engagement
description: The average cost of each inline post engagement.

name: cost_per_one_thousand_ad_impression
description: cost_per_one_thousand_ad_impression

name: cost_per_outbound_click
description: The average cost for each outbound click.

name: cost_per_thruplay
description: The average cost for each ThruPlay. This metric is in development.

name: cost_per_unique_action_type
description: The average cost of each unique action. This metric is estimated.

name: cost_per_unique_click
description: The average cost for each unique click (all). This metric is estimated.

name: cost_per_unique_inline_link_click
description: The average cost of each unique inline link click. This metric is estimated.

name: cost_per_unique_outbound_click
description: The average cost for each unique outbound click. This metric is estimated.

name: cpc
description: The average cost for each click (all).

name: cpm
description: The average cost for 1,000 impressions.

name: cpp
description: The average cost to reach 1,000 people. This metric is estimated.

name: ctr
description: The percentage of times people saw your ad and performed a click (all).

name: dda_countby_convs
description: dda_countby_convs

name: dda_results
description: Estimated incremental conversions caused by a given ad based on the objective and settings you selected. This is a modeled value.

name: engagement_rate_ranking
description: A ranking of your ad's expected engagement rate. Engagement includes all clicks, likes, comments and shares. Your ad is ranked against ads that competed for the same audience. Possible values include BELOW_AVERAGE_10, BELOW_AVERAGE_20, BELOW_AVERAGE_35, AVERAGE, ABOVE_AVERAGE, or UNKNOWN if there's not enough information about the ad. This metric is an ad relevance diagnostic and does not apply to campaigns or ad sets, only ads.

name: estimated_ad_recall_rate
description: The rate at which an estimated number of additional people, when asked, would remember seeing your ads within 2 days. This metric is only available for assets in the Brand awareness, Post engagement and Video views Objectives. This metric is estimated and in development.

name: estimated_ad_recallers
description: An estimate of the number of additional people who may remember seeing your ads, if asked, within 2 days. This metric is only available for assets in the Brand awareness, Post engagement and Video views Objectives. This metric is estimated and in development.

name: frequency
description: The average number of times each person saw your ad. This metric is estimated.

name: full_view_impressions
description: The number of Full Views on your Page's posts as a result of your ad.

name: full_view_reach
description: The number of people who performed a Full View on your Page's post as a result of your ad.

name: impressions
description: The number of times your ads were on screen.

name: inline_link_click_ctr
description: The percentage of time people saw your ads and performed an inline link click.

name: inline_link_clicks
description: The number of clicks on links to select destinations or experiences, on or off Facebook-owned properties. Inline link clicks use a fixed 1-day-click attribution window.

name: inline_post_engagement
description: The total number of actions that people take involving your ads. Inline post engagements use a fixed 1-day-click attribution window.

name: instagram_upcoming_event_reminders_set
description: The number of reminders set on an upcoming event, taking into account reminders unset.

name: instant_experience_clicks_to_open
description: The number of clicks on your ad that open an Instant Experience. This metric is in development.

name: instant_experience_clicks_to_start
description: The number of times an interactive component in an Instant Experience starts. This metric is in development.

name: instant_experience_outbound_clicks
description: The number of clicks on links in an Instant Experience that take people off Facebook-owned properties. This metric is in development.

name: interactive_component_tap
description: interactive_component_tap

name: marketing_messages_cost_per_delivered
description: marketing_messages_cost_per_delivered

name: marketing_messages_cost_per_link_btn_click
description: marketing_messages_cost_per_link_btn_click

name: marketing_messages_spend
description: marketing_messages_spend

name: mobile_app_purchase_roas
description: The total return on ad spend (ROAS) from mobile app purchases. This is based on the value that you assigned when you set up the app event.

name: outbound_clicks
description: The number of clicks on links that take people off Facebook-owned properties.

name: outbound_clicks_ctr
description: The percentage of times people saw your ad and performed an outbound click.

name: purchase_roas
description: The total return on ad spend (ROAS) from purchases. This is based on information received from one or more of your connected Facebook Business Tools and attributed to your ads.

name: qualifying_question_qualify_answer_rate
description: qualifying_question_qualify_answer_rate

name: quality_ranking
description: A ranking of your ad's perceived quality. Quality is measured using feedback on your ads and the post-click experience. Your ad is ranked against ads that competed for the same audience. Possible values include BELOW_AVERAGE_10, BELOW_AVERAGE_20, BELOW_AVERAGE_35, AVERAGE, ABOVE_AVERAGE, or UNKNOWN if there's not enough information about the ad. This metric is an ad relevance diagnostic (https://www.facebook.com/help/403110480493160) and does not apply to campaigns or ad sets, only ads.

name: reach
description: The number of people who saw your ads at least once. Reach is different from impressions, which may include multiple views of your ads by the same people. This metric is estimated.

name: social_spend
description: The total amount you've spent so far for your ads showed with social information. (ex: Jane Doe likes this).

name: spend
description: The estimated total amount of money you've spent on your campaign, ad set or ad during its schedule. This metric is estimated.

name: total_postbacks
description: The total number of postbacks received from Apple’s SKAdNetwork API. Postbacks from SKAdNetwork provide visibility into the number of app installs and post-install events that occurred. This metric is reported by a third-party API.

name: total_postbacks_detailed
description: Used to fetch detailed insights of total postbacks received from Apple’s SKAdNetwork API by using it along with breakdowns such as skan_campaign_id, is_conversion_id_modeled, etc. This metric is reported by a third-party API.

name: total_postbacks_detailed_v4
description: The total number of postbacks received from Apple’s SKAdNetwork API. Postbacks from SKAdNetwork provide visibility into the number of app installs and post-install events that occurred. This metric is reported by a third-party API.

name: unique_actions
description: unique_actions

name: unique_clicks
description: unique_clicks

name: unique_ctr
description: unique_ctr

name: unique_inline_link_click_ctr
description: unique_inline_link_click_ctr

name: unique_inline_link_clicks
description: unique_inline_link_clicks

name: unique_link_clicks_ctr
description: unique_link_clicks_ctr

name: unique_outbound_clicks
description: unique_outbound_clicks

name: unique_outbound_clicks_ctr
description: unique_outbound_clicks_ctr

name: unique_video_continuous_2_sec_watched_actions
description: unique_video_continuous_2_sec_watched_actions

name: unique_video_view_15_sec
description: unique_video_view_15_sec

name: video_15_sec_watched_actions
description: The number of times your video played for at least 15 seconds, or for nearly its total length if it's shorter than 30 seconds. For each impression of a video, we'll count video views separately and exclude any time spent replaying the video.

name: video_30_sec_watched_actions
description: The number of times your video played for at least 30 seconds, or for nearly its total length if it's shorter than 30 seconds. For each impression of a video, we'll count video views separately and exclude any time spent replaying the video.

name: video_avg_time_watched_actions
description: The average time a video was played, including any time spent replaying the video for a single impression.

name: video_continuous_2_sec_watched_actions
description: The average time a video was played, including any time spent replaying the video for a single impression.

name: video_p100_watched_actions
description: The number of times your video was played at 100% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point.

name: video_p25_watched_actions
description: The number of times your video was played at 25% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point.

name: video_p50_watched_actions
description: The number of times your video was played at 50% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point.

name: video_p75_watched_actions
description: The number of times your video was played at 75% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point.

name: video_p95_watched_actions
description: The number of times your video was played at 95% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point.

name: video_play_actions
description: The number of times your video starts to play. This is counted for each impression of a video, and excludes replays. This metric is in development.

name: video_play_curve_actions
description: A video-play based curve graph that illustrates the percentage of video plays that reached a given second. Entries 0 to 14 represent seconds 0 thru 14. Entries 15 to 17 represent second ranges [15 to 20), [20 to 25), and [25 to 30). Entries 18 to 20 represent second ranges [30 to 40), [40 to 50), and [50 to 60). Entry 21 represents plays over 60 seconds.

name: video_play_retention_0_to_15s_actions
description: video_play_retention_0_to_15s_actions

name: video_play_retention_20_to_60s_actions
description: video_play_retention_20_to_60s_actions

name: video_play_retention_graph_actions
description: video_play_retention_graph_actions

name: video_thruplay_watched_actions
description: video_thruplay_watched_actions

name: video_time_watched_actions
description: video_time_watched_actions

name: website_ctr
description: The percentage of times people saw your ad and performed a link click.

name: website_purchase_roas
description: The total return on ad spend (ROAS) from website purchases. This is based on the value of all conversions recorded by the Facebook pixel on your website and attributed to your ads.

name: wish_bid
description: wish_bid
